name: (non)Danger-Noodles
description:
This game was made in my 2D Game Art class. It is the second game for that class.

In (non)Danger-Noodles you play as Spits, a snake working in a restaurant in a city of snakes. Your coworkers include your boss Regis Hood and the cashier Herman, while the rattlesnake musician Blue is a regular customer. This game is meant to be seen as a demo to a larger game, although I'm not sure if I would pursue that further.
